item.title: Why Boomer Business Owners Need to Set Exit Strategies Now
item.description: A majority of older entrepreneurs plan to sell their businesses within five years. Few have made preparations to ensure a smooth transition.

item.title: ‘Ohio shouldn’t have done it’: Republican governor ‘absolutely’ regrets legalizing sports gambling
item.description: Mike DeWine told the AP that his concerns with sports gambling began almost as soon as Ohio's law took effect in 2023.
